title: Randormator Lead Stop Posting
body: Please stop spamming the boards mate

replies.body:
> Please stop spamming the boards mate

I didn't noticed until you brought it up LOL xD

Mate, the stuff that I've seen Randomator Lead post has been of much better content than this shit.

He has actually posted content that can start a discussion. You know, that thing that people do when they talk about topics?

1/10 worst effort today
Half of it is just spam
It's better spam than this post
He posted complete stupid and useless posts which was never gonna happen.
Ikr idk what this guy is on
This is why i made the switch to the na boards, this board is just way to salty
